name: Death Roulette: August Chapter
description:
Inoue Shinozaki has just been discharged from the hospital, hoping to recover from the trauma she suffered over a month prior. Upon her arrival, however, she learns that L.C. has subjected her batch mates to the same twisted game as her.

A suspect has been named, but the implausibility causes the group to split into two different sides. Despite that, they take similar steps to uncover the truth: to investigate the Sacred Heart Curse Killings in any manner possible. At the same time, they would solve their own casualties while staying alert for any threats L.C. has prepared for them.

What knowledge would they gain and how would they use it? It is left to their own decisions...

Note: Contains copyrighted music.
